subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Geovany Soto’s three-run homer capped a four-run rally with two outs that sent the Chicago Cubs to a 5-2 victory over the San Francisco Giants on Thursday at Wrigley Field.
snippet: Geovany Soto’s three-run homer capped a four-run rally with two outs that sent the Chicago Cubs to a 5-2 victory over the San Francisco Giants on Thursday at Wrigley Field.
